subject: credit card
body: i’m thankful that though i thought i had lost my credit card and could not find it anywhere and was going to have to deal with that tomorrow i remembered just before giving up that it might be in the little pouch attached to my water bottle and it was in fact in there.\_\_\_PARAGRAPH\_BREAK\_\_\_
